Objects¶

Here you can check the code on this submodule:

Cart¶

class fastemplate.objects.cart.CartItem(*, name: str = 'berries', price: float = 1.25)[source]¶

Schema to represent an item when receiving a request.

class fastemplate.objects.cart.CartItemsList(*, names: Set[str] = ['potato', 'orange', 'tomato'], prices: List[float] = [1.25, 2, 0.8])[source]¶

Schema to represent a list of items when receiving a request.

class fastemplate.objects.cart.ItemPack(*, name: str = 'berries', price: float = 1.25, qnt: int = 1)[source]¶

Schema to represent a pack item when receiving a request. Since it extends CartItem, it will, basically, be the same as a CartItem with the added qnt field.

User¶

class fastemplate.objects.user.User(*, username: str, full_name: str, owner: bool)[source]¶

Schema to represent a user when dealing with authentication.
